summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of Get Driven Loon Calculator completed. Fixed critical authentication bug in backend and verified all major functionality works correctly.

fixed_issues.issue: FastAPI authentication dependency injection not working
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Updated get_current_user to use Header dependency and updated all protected routes to use Depends(get_current_user)
fixed_issues.impact: All protected endpoints now work correctly

passed_tests: Ride CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Salary calculation with night hours and overtime
Landing page loads with correct title 'GET DRIVEN LOON CALCULATOR'
Navigation from landing to auth page via 'Aan de slag' button
Dashboard loads with stat cards and charts after login
Add ride form with all fields (date, client, car, time, costs, wwv)
Ride appears in history with salary calculations
Settings page loads with adjustable rates
Ride edit and delete buttons present
